akn:subsection.akn:heading: Disposition of fees collected from aliens granted parole

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Disposition of fees collected from aliens granted parole All of the fees collected pursuant to this section shall be deposited into the general fund of the Treasury.
(f) No fee waiver Except as provided in subsection (b), fees required to be paid under this section shall not be waived or reduced.
